title: My ranked victories and my points are stucked.
body: My victories and my points are stucked.It says that i have only 32 victories and 0 points but i should have more victories and more points.What should i do? I cant promote if my points are stucked to 0.Help me!

replies.body: Many days have passed since my victories and my points are frozen.I closed and opened lol many times but still are stucked.I think this will remain like that forever.Plz do something.I get victories but my victories dont increase at all.
Your client might just be having a hard time getting those numbers refreshed. Try closing and reopening the client to force an update and let me know if they still don't change.
